text.#text:
A plan sponsor may elect for a plan
				to cease to be treated as an eligible charity plan for plan years beginning
				after December 31, 2013. Such election shall be made at such time and in such
				form and manner as shall be prescribed by the

header.#text:
Election not to
				be an eligible charity plan

				and no other plan years shall be so treated.

header.#text:
Election to use
				funding options available to other plan sponsors

text.#text:
The amendments made by this section shall take effect on the
			 date of the enactment of this Act.
